items.sentence: My friend Tom has twice as many stamps as I do.
My older brother, Tom, was born here in Boston.
My parents prohibited me from seeing Tom again.
Tom heard some music coming from the next room.
Tom knows what to say to make Mary forgive him.
Tom lived in Boston until he was ten years old.
Tom met Mary this morning on his way to school.
You\'re not actually going to do that, are you?
You\'re the only person I know that owns a gun.
You\'re the only person I know who can help me.
